column2:
"If you stew Vol Dragon fangs long enough,
they'll release just the right amount of acidity
to tenderize meat so that it melts in your mouth."

"If I succeed at this, of course,
I plan to enter the contest!"

"I'd love to make the big leap from galley cook to
gourmet chef."

"This is what I've always dreamed of.
Please, you have to do this for me! Please?
Just make sure you don't damage the goods, okay?"

"「ヴォル・ドラゴンの牙」はじっくり
煮込むと、ほどよく酸味が出るから
お肉がやわらかーくトロけるはずよ。"

"これが成功すれば、もちろん
コンクールに応募するつもりよ！"

"厨房のコックから、夢の料理人へと
大きくはばたくの！"

"ね、ね、私の夢がかかってるの！
どうかよろしくね！
できるだけいい状態でね！"
